nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.persistence

Class AssetManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.persistence.AssetManager

  • public class AssetManager
extends java.lang.Object
    AssetManager class is responsible for dealing with storing and scaling all the assets used in the game.

      • loadAsset

        private void loadAsset(javax.swing.ImageIcon imageIcon,
                       java.lang.String fname)
        Loads an asset from an ImageIcon. If invalid asset, will replace Image and description with 'unknown.png' and corresponding image stored within the assets directory.
        Parameters:
        imageIcon - ImageIcon to load.
        fname - filename of asset.

      • getOverlaidImages

        private javax.swing.ImageIcon getOverlaidImages(java.lang.String mergedFnames)
        Gets an overlaid ImageIcon of the files within the conjoined filename. Filename has '-' delimitation. Ie, "free.png-flippers.png"
        Parameters:
        mergedFnames - of files with SEPARATOR final field delimiter.
        Returns:
        combined imageIcon.

      • getNumberedScaledImage

        public javax.swing.ImageIcon getNumberedScaledImage(java.lang.String fname,
                                                    int number)
        Gets an ImageIcon at the last scaled size, with a number overlay. Number will be clipped from [1,9].
        Parameters:
        fname - file path.
        number - to overlay from [1,9].
        Returns:
        ImageIcon.
